cert_path_note: You can use an absolute path to the certificate, like '/opt/certs/cert.pem', or just upload it per drag&drop
copy note: Press Ctrl+A and Ctrl+C to copy the log to the clipboard and click with the mouse anywhere to close.
diag-note:
Help us to make ioBroker even better!
Allow the transmission of anonymous usage statistics and crash reports. The exact scope of the data sent to iobroker.org when updating the adapter list can be selected below and is shown in the overview on the right. The data does not contain any personal information and helps us to set the priorities for the further development of ioBroker in the interest of all users and to be able to correct occurring errors quickly.
Much thanks for supporting our hard work by agreeing to the transmission of the statistical data!
letsnecrypt_help: This are settings for Let's Encrypt account. To get the free certificates for your domain. You can read more here.
letsnecrypt_help_email: Please use your email address. It will be used for your account.
letsnecrypt_help_path: Directory name where the certificates will be stored. This is always relative to configuration directory
license not agree: Do not agree with the license!
license_checkbox:
I agree with the collection of anonymous statistics.
(This can be disabled in settings)
name: name
this adapter does not allow multiple ins: This adapter does not allow multiple instances
title: title
update_info_no_net: For information about updating the controller, visit this page: Update JS-Contoller
I agree with the collection of anonymous: I agree with the collection of anonymous statistics and automatically reporting crashes.
(This can be disabled later in settings): (This can be disabled later in settings)
You must set the administrator password: You must set the administrator password
Password must be at least 8 characters l: Password must be at least 8 characters long and have numbers, upper and lower case letters
Press ENTER to write the value, when foc: Press ENTER to write the value, when focused
You can change the host name, but be awa: You can change the host name, but be aware, that all instances must be assigned anew
How oft the disk will be checked. Do not: In which interval (in ms) the disk will be checked. Do not set it to low, because it can affect system performance.
How oft the instance statistics will be: In which interval (in ms) the instance statistics (Used RAM, CPU, ...) will be updated.
Show warning im log if RAM less than: Show warning im log if RAM less than
Show error in log if RAM less than: Show error in log if RAM less than
The host running syslogd, defaults to lo: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost
The port on the host that syslog is runn: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port(514/UDP).
The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
Host to indicate that log messages are c: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
The type of the syslog protocol to use (: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD).
The name of the application (Default: pr: The name of the application (Default: process.title).
The end of line character to be added to: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Message without modifications).
Remote host of the HTTP logging endpoint: Remote host of the HTTP logging endpoint
Remote port of the HTTP logging endpoint: Remote port of the HTTP logging endpoint
Remote URI of the HTTP logging endpoint: Remote URI of the HTTP logging endpoint
An object representing the username and: An object representing the username and password for HTTP Basic Auth
any Node.js stream. If an objectMode str: any Node.js stream. If an objectMode stream is provided then the entire info object will be written. Otherwise info[MESSAGE] will be written
Level of messages that this transport sh: Loglevel to use for logging for this transport. ("Default" means that the Loglevel from the relevant adapter instance/host is used and can be changed dynamically as required, All other options define the Loglevel statically)
Always read files from disk and do not c: Always read files from disk and do not cache them in RAM. Used for debugging.
How often the data from RAM will be save: In which interval (in ms) the data from RAM will be saved on disk
By every write the backup of object.json: By every write the backup of object.json will be created.
Minimal number of backup files, after th: Minimal number of backup files, after the deletion will be executed according to the backup time settings
All backups older than these hours will: All backups older than these hours will be deleted, but only if the number of files is greater than of the files number
By default the backup is every 2 hours. Time is in minutes. To disable backup set the value to 0
Absolute path to backup directory or emp: Absolute path to backup directory or empty to backup in data directory. Leave it empty for default storage place.
The http(s) URL including port of the se: The http(s) URL including port of the seq server. If you use HTTPS a real certificate is needed; self signed certs are ot accepted.
The apiKey of the seq system: The apiKey of the seq system
Don't install adapters from GitHub unles: Don't install adapters from GitHub unless asked by a developer or when you are 100 %sure what you are doing! Adapters on GitHub are still under development and might contain bugs or breaking changes. Only install them if you are participating in a test! Else please wait for an official release of the adapter!
confirm_change_repo: The "Beta" repository contains adapter versions that have not been fully tested. Please report problems with these versions to the developer on GitHub or in the relevant forum threads. Use this adapter version at your own risk.
certs_hint: You can use absolute path of certificate, '/opt/certs/cert.pem' for example, or you can and drop files here

Now the expert mode will be active only: Now the expert mode will be active only during this browser session.
Adapter cannot request the exactly devic: Adapter cannot request the exactly device status and the status will be guessed on the last sent command
Now the expert mode will be deactivated: Now the expert mode will be deactivated only during this browser session.
allow set of compact groups: Allow set of the compact groups
When enabled adapter instances can run i: When enabled adapter instances can run in one or few processes to save RAM usage.
When activated this host can be discover: When activated this host can be discovered by other ioBroker installations in your network to become the master of a multihost system.
Cannot enable authentication as no certi: Cannot enable authentication as no certificates found!

The Cloud services from iobroker.net/pro: The Cloud services from iobroker.net/pro can help here to do that securely:
Do not expose iobroker Admin or Web inte: Do not expose iobroker Admin or Web interfaces to the internet directly via the port forwarding!
It is suggested to enable the authentica: It is suggested to enable the authentication in admin
Browsers will inform you about the probl: Browsers will inform you about the problem with self-signed certificates, but the communication is encrypted.
Activate the check of password in admin: Activate the check of password in admin if you plan to access your ioBroker is not in "Demilitarized Zone"
Your communication with admin is not enc: Your communication with admin is not encrypted
The expert mode allows you to view and e: The expert mode allows you to view and edit system internal details.
Please make sure you know what you are d: Please make sure you know what you are doing!
Default V8 has a memory limit of 512mb o: Default V8 engine has a memory limit of 512mb on 32-bit systems, and 1gb on 64-bit systems. The limit can be raised by setting --max-old-space-size to a maximum of ~1gb (32-bit) and ~1.7gb (64-bit)
Tiers define the order of adapters when: Tiers define the order of adapters when the system starts.

stop_admin: You are trying to stop the current admin instance. You will not be able to configure ioBroker via browser any longer. You can start admin later via CLI command "iob start %s". Are you sure?
switch_db_note: It is no suggested to change to type of the database in this settings, as no data migration will be done. It is better to use CLI command "iob setup custom", so the all data will be migrated to new database. Are sure, that you want to switch the database type here?

enabled, alive, but not connected to con: enabled, alive, but not connected to controller

Due to the different hardware and platfo: Due to the different hardware and platforms under which ioBroker runs, the js-controller has to be updated manually. Further details can be found in the appropriate section.
Please execute the following commands in: Please execute the following commands in an SSH shell (console):
or reboot server, then ioBroker should r: or reboot the server, then ioBroker should restart and you can be sure that all old processes were finished.
If the upgrade command displays Access R: If the upgrade command displays Access Rights / Permission errors, then please use the install fixer
to fix these issues and upgrade command: to fix these issues and upgrade command run again.
A manual installation usually takes plac: A manual installation usually takes place under root as user and therefore a "sudo" is necessary before the commands.
If the upgrade command displays permissi: If the upgrade command displays permissions / permissions errors, fix them. Sometimes "sudo" is not enough and you have to run the installation as a real root (previously simply "sudo su -").
(manual reinstallation, if somehow nothi: (manual reinstallation, if somehow nothing works after the update)
On Windows first please call in the star: On Windows first please call in the start menu under "ioBroker" the command line of the relevant ioBroker instance. The correct directory is then set automatically. On Linux or macOS please go to the ioBroker directory.
Run npm install iobroker.js-controller t: Run npm install iobroker.js-controller there. A specific version can be installed using "npm install iobroker.js-controller@x.y.z" (replace "x.y.z" with the desired version).
If there are problems with access rights: If there are problems with access rights when running on Linux the command has to be changed slightly:
For systems created with the new Linux i: For systems created with the new Linux installer:
For systems installed manually under Lin: For systems installed manually under Linux, prefix sudo or run as root.
This way is only necessary in very few c: This way is only necessary in very few cases and please consult the forum beforehand!
Otherwise please update the slaves first: Otherwise please update the slaves first with an update of master-slave systems and the master last!
For an update from js-controller 1.x to: For an update from js-controller please always read the information at

If single lines in the DB are corrupted,: If single lines in the DB are corrupted, they can be ignored without losing the whole DB.
The JSONL DB is append-only and will con: The JSONL DB is append-only and will contain unnecessary entries after a while.
It will be compressed when the uncompres: It will be compressed when the uncompressed size is >= size * sizeFactor AND >= sizeFactorMinimumSize
Write to the database file no more than: Write to the database file no more than every X milliseconds
Force writing after this many changes ha: Force writing after this many changes have been buffered. This reduces memory consumption and data loss in case of a crash
